value.summary: The JSON outputs closely track the report’s study design (preclinical murine + retrospective human), cohort sizes (L19–L23), quantitative results (L28–L33), key conditional/negative controls (L36–L39), proposed mechanism (L41–L46), and major caveats about the human evidence (L49–L53) and the need for prospective trials (L55–L56). No fabricated numerical values are introduced, and the reported p-value (L30) is not overstated as causal. Line references provided are valid and correspond to the text
